commit.message:
PR middle-end/85643 - attribute nonstring fails to squash -Wstringop-truncation warning

gcc/ChangeLog:

	PR middle-end/85643
	* calls.c (get_attr_nonstring_decl): Handle MEM_REF.

gcc/testsuite/ChangeLog:

	PR middle-end/85643
	* c-c++-common/attr-nonstring-7.c: New test.

From-SVN: r260271
